//.babel-preset-react-native-stage-0: Babel presets for React Native applications. React Native itself uses this Babel preset by default when transforming your app's source code.
//.styled-components: Its used to style our components. We're not using StyleSheets.
//.jest: Jest is a complete and easy to set up JavaScript testing solution. In fact, Jest works out of the box for any React project.
//.react-test-renderer: This package provides an experimental React renderer that can be used to render React components to pure JavaScript objects, without depending on the DOM or a native mobile environment. Essentially, this package makes it easy to grab a snapshot of the 'DOM tree' rendered by a React DOM or React Native component without using a browser or jsdom.
//.react-navigation: Responsible to manage the presentation of, and transition between, multiple screens
//.redux-thunk: Redux Thunk middleware allows you to write action creators that return a function instead of an action.
//.redux-logger: Redux logging tool that lets you replay problems as if they happened in your own browser.
//.rn-fetch-blob: A project committed to making file access and data transfer easier, efficient for React Native developers.
//.babel-preset-env: A Babel preset that compiles ES2015+
//.fetch-mock: Mock http requests made using fetch
//.redux-mock-store: A mock store for testing Redux async action creators and middleware
//.babel-polyfill: Provides polyfills necessary for a full ES2015+ environment
